channel.title: BBCode help.
channel.description:
How do I make an image that functions as a link? I.e., click the image to follow the link?
I had tried, [url]https://linkherelol.com][img]https://linkherelol.com/image1[/img][/url] but obviously that didn't work out to well...
Any and all help is [i]greatly[/i] appreciated.
EDIT: BBcode is being registered, even when I wrapped "CODE" tags around it. You can still see it for the effect though, it didn't work. :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: BBCode help.
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

<url=“url_here”>image_url_here

should do the trick. Just replace the angle brackets with square brackets.

like so.

Ok, thanks a bunch.

Read full topic

item.title: BBCode help.
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
<url=“url_here”>image_url_here

should do the trick. Just replace the angle brackets with square brackets.

like so.

item.title: BBCode help.
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
How do I make an image that functions as a link?
I.e., click the image to follow the link?

I had tried,
https://linkherelol.com]
but obviously that didn’t work out to well…

Any and all help is greatly appreciated.

EDIT: BBcode is being registered, even when I wrapped “CODE” tags around it. You can still see it for the effect though, it didn’t work.
